extends Ellipse

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double r,
              java.awt.Color c,
              double strokeWidth,
              java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Creates a new instance of a circle object.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the center of the ellipse
        y - Y coordinate of the center of the ellipse
        r - Radius of the ellipse in pixels
        c - Color of this shape
        strokeWidth - weight of the line this shape will be drawn with
        fillColor - color this shape will be filled with

    • Method Detail

      • onEllipse

        public boolean onEllipse(double x,
                         double y)
        Checks if a point is on the ellipse (if a point was drawn and the ellipse was as well, the point would be on the unfilled edge)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the point
        y - y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        if a point is on the edge of the ellipse (the line drawn)

      • onEllipse

        public boolean onEllipse(java.awt.geom.Point2D point)
        Checks if a point is on the ellipse (if a point was drawn and the ellipse was as well, the point would be on the unfilled edge)
        Parameters:
        point - the point being checked
        Returns:
        if a point is on the edge of the ellipse (the line drawn)

        Parameters:
